scripts.build:mcp-servers: for dir in custom-mcp-servers/*; do if [ -f "$dir/package.json" ]; then (cd "$dir" && echo "Building $dir..." && npm run build); fi; done
scripts.dev:mcp-servers: for dir in custom-mcp-servers/*; do if [ -f "$dir/package.json" ]; then (cd "$dir" && echo "Starting $dir..." && npm run dev); fi; done
scripts.install:mcp-servers: for dir in custom-mcp-servers/*; do if [ -f "$dir/package.json" ]; then (cd "$dir" && echo "Installing dependencies for $dir..." && npm install); fi; done
scripts.build:all: npm run build:mcp-servers && npm run build
